Sentencas: Nucleation and growth of lanthanum zirconate (LZO) between (001) single crystals of 9.5 mol% Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 (YSZ) and porous La0.85Sr0.15MnyO3=delta (y = 0.95... .10) perovskites were investigated.
Titulo: La2Zr2O7 formation and oxygen reduction kinetics of the La0.85Sr0.15MnyO3, O2(g)|YSZ system

Sentencas: The perovskites were screen-printed on the solid electrolyte and sintered in air at 1373 K for short periods.
Titulo: La2Zr2O7 formation and oxygen reduction kinetics of the La0.85Sr0.15MnyO3, O2(g)|YSZ system

Sentencas: High resolution transmission electron microscopy, electrochemical impedance spectroscopy, and atomic force microscopy were employed for interface characterization.
Titulo: La2Zr2O7 formation and oxygen reduction kinetics of the La0.85Sr0.15MnyO3, O2(g)|YSZ system

Sentencas: The manganese concentration in the perovskite affects the onset of nucleation and the growth rate of lanthanum zirconate.
Titulo: La2Zr2O7 formation and oxygen reduction kinetics of the La0.85Sr0.15MnyO3, O2(g)|YSZ system

Sentencas: Excess lanthanum oxide within the perovskite reacts immediately with YSZ to form dense LZO layers.
Titulo: La2Zr2O7 formation and oxygen reduction kinetics of the La0.85Sr0.15MnyO3, O2(g)|YSZ system

Sentencas: Layer growth kinetics is controlled by bulk diffusion of cations.
Titulo: La2Zr2O7 formation and oxygen reduction kinetics of the La0.85Sr0.15MnyO3, O2(g)|YSZ system

Sentencas: Stoichiometric perovskite leads to the reductive formation of cubic LZO islands at the cathode/electrolyte interface after a few minutes of sintering, The A-site deficient perovskite is characterized by the reductive dissolution of Mn into YSZ in the early sintering stage and by a pronounced surface diffusion of cations.
Titulo: La2Zr2O7 formation and oxygen reduction kinetics of the La0.85Sr0.15MnyO3, O2(g)|YSZ system

Sentencas: After the critical Mn concentration in the perovskite is reached, reductive nucleation of LZO originates.
Titulo: La2Zr2O7 formation and oxygen reduction kinetics of the La0.85Sr0.15MnyO3, O2(g)|YSZ system

Sentencas: Island growth is controlled by surface diffusion of cations and the supply of lanthanum.
Titulo: La2Zr2O7 formation and oxygen reduction kinetics of the La0.85Sr0.15MnyO3, O2(g)|YSZ system

Sentencas: The electrochemical properties of the cathode/YSZ interfaces are strongly influenced by the formation of LZO at the triple phase boundary.
Titulo: La2Zr2O7 formation and oxygen reduction kinetics of the La0.85Sr0.15MnyO3, O2(g)|YSZ system

Sentencas: Charge transfer, dissociation of adsorbed molecular oxygen ions, and surface diffusion of atomic oxygen are discriminated from electrochemical impedance data.
Titulo: La2Zr2O7 formation and oxygen reduction kinetics of the La0.85Sr0.15MnyO3, O2(g)|YSZ system
